content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.a) Describe one process that contributed to Great Britain's industrial dominance in the early nineteenth century.b) Explain the process by which the Industrial Revolution spread to one country in Europe other than Great Britain.c) Describe one social effect of the Industrial Revolution in nineteenth-century Europe.

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
